entry.title: Ruby on Trails - RubyKaigi 2023
entry.summary: Sponsored and hosted by YAMAP Inc.
entry.content:
æ—¥æœ¬èªã®èª¬æ˜æ–‡ã¯è‹±èªã®ä¸‹ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

Overview

Matsumoto City in Nagano Prefecture, where RubyKaigi 2023 will be held, is a popular place for mountain climbing! YAMAP, a mountaineering map GPS app, will hold a hiking event. The destination is Kirigamine, one of Japan's 100 most famous mountains. The event can be done with sneakers, so beginners are welcome to join. Three YAMAP guides will accompany you on the hike.

Conditions of Participation

This event is open to RubyKaigi 2023 ticket holders only.

Schedule

Time Action
08:45 Gather at Matsumoto Station Alps Exit
09:00 Departure (by chartered bus)
10:30 Arrive at the site
10:30 - 14:00 Hike & Lunch (lunch will be provided by YAMAP)
14:00 Departure (by chartered bus)
15:30 (May be before or after) Dismissal at Matsumoto Station Alps Exit

The course will be a small circuit of the Kirigamine (Kurumayama) course.

Please install the YAMAP application and check how to use it in advance.

How to use YAMAP

What to bring

  • RubyKaigi 2023 nametag
  • Comfortable walking shoes (sneakers OK)
  • Clothing suitable for hiking
  • Warm clothes (fleece, down, etc.)
  • Snacks
  • Beverages
  • Rain wear
  • Towel
  • Medicine

Included in the event

  • Bus
  • Lunch
  • Leisure insurance
  • Guide

Notes.

The event will be canceled in case of rain. However, in case of light drizzle, it will proceed as planned. Transportation to the meeting place and overnight stay if necessary are to be borne by the participants.

Disclaimer

We will not be liable for compensation in the following cases when there is no willful misconduct or negligence on our part.

  • Damages caused by force majeure, such as natural disasters, alliances, etc.
  • Damages caused by theft, injury, illness, etc., which are caused by the customer's willful act or negligence.
  • Damages caused by the customer's conduct contrary to the law or public order and morals.
  • Damages caused by transportation or any other cause for which the Company is not responsible.

Contact

Please contact us by email below.

  • Email: ruby-hiking@yamap.co.jp
  • Contact: Higuchi, Suginohara, YAMAP Inc.

Privacy Policy

We will use the personal information provided by the participant appropriately only for the purpose of contacting the participant in accordance with the said policy.

Privacy Policy: https://yamap.com/terms/privacy
